definition: feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)

sentences.english: Who says the headiness diminishes ones the bottle is empty?
sentences.chinese: 誰說酒瓶空了，酒興就沒了？

sentences.english: Days to pay two drums, taking advantage of revelry left Aheng assassin, ran to the sun and the moon Pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 天交二鼓，刺客趁酒興離開了阿衡，向日月閣奔去。

sentences.english: Granin: Put that thing away. You'll spoil my drink.
sentences.chinese: 把這東西拿開，會壞了我的酒興的。
